question: What are the names of projects that are related to disaster and have a start date later than 2021? Only list the names of these projects
sub_query: Projects with a start date later than 2021
final_answer: The names of projects related to disaster with a start date later than 2021 are the Latigo Canyon Road Roadway/Retaining Wall Improvements and the Bluffs Park Shade Structure. The Bluffs Park Shade Structure project is anticipated to have a final design by March 2022 and will be advertised for construction bids shortly after. The Latigo Canyon Road project is still finalizing the design and is expected to begin construction in Spring 2022. These projects are part of the upcoming Capital Improvement Program that includes disaster recovery projects funded by FEMA after the Woolsey Fire.
sub_answers: The upcoming Capital Improvement Program includes disaster recovery projects funded by FEMA after the Woolsey Fire. These projects involve creating a complete inventory of drainage structures and replacing damaged guardrails in the city. Design work for disaster projects such as water quality infrastructure repairs and roadway improvements is ongoing.

Projects with a start date later than 2021 include the Latigo Canyon Road Roadway/Retaining Wall Improvements and the Bluffs Park Shade Structure. The Bluffs Park Shade Structure project is anticipated to have a final design by March 2022 and will be advertised for construction bids shortly after. The Latigo Canyon Road project is still finalizing the design and is expected to begin construction in Spring 2022.
